OCR_info.question_text: 다음 중 바르게 계산한 것은 어느 것입니까? ①$ 4 \mathrm{~L}+3 \mathrm{~L} 600 \mathrm{~mL}=3 \mathrm{~L} 604 \mathrm{~mL} $ ②$ 2 \mathrm{~L} 500 \mathrm{~mL}+1 \mathrm{~L} 800 \mathrm{~mL}=5 \mathrm{~L} 300 \mathrm{~mL} $ ③$ 5 \mathrm{~L} 20 \mathrm{~mL}+3 \mathrm{~L} 90 \mathrm{~mL}=9 \mathrm{~L} 10 \mathrm{~mL} $ ④$ 6 \mathrm{~L} 700 \mathrm{~mL}+40 \mathrm{~mL}=6 \mathrm{~L} 740 \mathrm{~mL} $ ⑤$ 4 \mathrm{~L} 600 \mathrm{~mL}+2 \mathrm{~L} 900 \mathrm{~mL}=6 \mathrm{~L} 500 \mathrm{~mL} $
